name: Magnattraction
description:
Utilize the power of magnetic attraction to avoid obstacles and solve puzlles!

Use the left and right arrow keys or "A" and "D" to move the Magnet at the top of each level, and hold the space bar to activate magnetism, drawing any nearby metal objects towards the Magnet. Get to the Hole in each level to clear the level, and be sure to collect the sparkling Diamonds along the way!

Created for University of Utah Gamecraft Game Jam 2022 

Created by MJ Galicha, Joshua Hardy, and Benjamin Sehmel

Music from Adobe Free Library

Background images and Hazards free from Unity Asset Store
